## Portfolio risk and correlation

```{ojs}

portfoliodata = FileAttachment("portfolio.csv")
  .csv({typed: true})
  
```

```{ojs}
viewof corr_value = Inputs.range(
  [-1, 1], 
  {value: 1, step: 0.1, label: "Corr:"}
)
```

```{ojs}
filtered = portfoliodata.filter(function(pf) {
  return corr_value == pf.correl/100;
})
```

```{ojs}
Plot.plot({
  x: { label: "Standard Deviation", tickFormat: ".0%"},
  y: { label: "Expected Return", tickFormat: ".0%", zero:true},
  marks: [
    Plot.ruleY([0], {filter: false}),
    Plot.ruleY([0.12], {filter: false}),
    Plot.ruleX([0], {filter: false}),
    Plot.ruleX([0.2], {filter: false}),
    Plot.line(filtered, { x: "sdp", y: "erp"})]
  plot.setAttribute("font-size", 30)
})
```
